## Shape.Paths property

获取自定义几何形状的路径。

```csharp
public ShapePathCollection Paths { get; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
//如果有自定义geometry

if(shape.Paths == null)
    Console.WriteLine("No custom geometry path.");
```
